objects.name: Analytic 0497
objects.description: Detection of anomalous ROMMON image changes or upgrades, unexpected reboots following firmware updates, and unauthorized use of firmware upgrade commands or TFTP transfers. Correlation of config modification, privilege escalation, and boot cycle anomalies provides visibility into ROMMON tampering attempts.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: networkdevice:syslog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Unexpected reload, crashinfo, or boot message not tied to scheduled maintenance

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: NSM:Flow
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Outbound or inbound TFTP file transfers of ROMMON or firmware binaries
